page.title: 07A LEVEL CHOICES AT 16 PLUS
page.content: Maths,Economics,and Geography was my choice.I considered them to be a good combination since each subject involves mathematical processes which I considered to be my strongest part of school subjects.I was advised by someone who had done this combination that it provided a good balance between fun and usefulness and it would be beneficial for a business job.The Economics helps to give an insight into transactions and decisions in the business world which leads on to some ideas suggested within Geography relating to peoples decisions of settlements ,communications etc.The Maths helps considerably with the manipulation of data and statistics for both subjects and helps make comparisons somewhat easier.
